str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
Witness, evidence, testimony, reputation. From martus; evidence given.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.
